item.title: Order on Improving Cost-Effectiveness in Federal Contracts
item.description: This executive order establishes guidelines aimed at enhancing the cost-effectiveness of federal contracts by eliminating unnecessary expenditures of taxpayer funds. The order outlines measures to ensure that federal contracting processes prioritize commercial solutions that are financially responsible. It emphasizes adherence to statutory preferences and aims to improve the overall fiscal management of federal contracts, thereby promoting transparency and greater accountability in government spending.
